entry.title: bchiang7/bchiang7.github.io
entry.summary:
Third iteration of my personal website built with Jekyll

v3

Third iteration of my personal website built with Jekyll.

ðŸ“¢ PSA for those who want to fork or copy this repo and use it for their own site:

Please be a decent person and give me proper credit by linking back to my website! Refer to this handy quora post if you're not sure.

Dependencies

  • Gulp

Getting Started

  1. gem install jekyll sass bundler jekyll-minifier jekyll-sitemap
  2. npm install
  3. npm start
